text: One should think about us this way—as servants of Christ and stewards of the mysteries of God.

<st data-num="5602 3062">Now</st> what is <st data-num="2212" class="">sought</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3623" class="">stewards</st> is <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">one</st> be <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> <st data-num="4103" class="">faithful</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> for <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="1646">minor matter</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> I am <st data-num="350" class="">judged</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> any <st data-num="442">human</st> <st data-num="2250">court</st>. <st data-num="235">In fact</st>, I do <st data-num="3761">not even</st> <st data-num="350" class="">judge</st> <st data-num="1683" class="">myself</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> I am <st data-num="3762">not</st> <st data-num="4894" class="">aware</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">of</st> <st data-num="3762">anything</st> against <st data-num="1683" class="">myself</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> I am <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1344" class="">acquitted</st> <st data-num="1722">because of</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>. The one who <st data-num="350" class="">judges</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>.

So then, do not judge anything before the time. Wait until the Lord comes. He will bring to light the hidden things of darkness and reveal the motives of hearts. Then each will receive recognition from God.

I have applied these things to myself and Apollos because of you, brothers and sisters, so that through us you may learn “not to go beyond what is written,” so that none of you will be puffed up in favor of the one against the other.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1252" class="">concedes</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1252" class="">any superiority</st>? <st data-num="5101" class="">What</st> do you <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> you did <st data-num="3756">not</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">receive</st>? <st data-num="1161">And</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> you <st data-num="2983" class="">received</st> it, <st data-num="5101" class="">why</st> do you <st data-num="2744" class="">boast</st> <st data-num="5613">as though</st> you did <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st>?

<st data-num="2235" class="">Already</st> you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="2880" class="">satisfied</st>! <st data-num="2235" class="">Already</st> you are <st data-num="4147" class="">rich</st>! You have <st data-num="936" class="">become kings</st> <st data-num="5565" class="">without</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>! I <st data-num="3785" class="">wish</st> you had <st data-num="936">become kings</st> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> could <st data-num="4821" class="">reign</st> with <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>!

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st>, I <st data-num="1380" class="">think</st>, <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> has <st data-num="584" class="">exhibited</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st> <st data-num="2078" class="">last</st> of all, <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="1935">men condemned to die</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> we have <st data-num="1096" class="">become</st> a <st data-num="2302" class="">spectacle</st> to the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">both</st> to <st data-num="32" class="">angels</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="444" class="">people</st>.

<st data-num="1473" class="">We</st> are <st data-num="3474" class="">fools</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">for</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> are <st data-num="5429" class="">wise</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>! <st data-num="1473" class="">We</st> are <st data-num="772" class="">weak</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> are <st data-num="2478" class="">strong</st>! <st data-num="4771" class="">You</st> are <st data-num="1741" class="">distinguished</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> are <st data-num="820" class="">dishonored</st>!

<st data-num="891">To</st> the <st data-num="737" class="">present</st> <st data-num="5610" class="">hour</st> we are <st data-num="3983" class="">hungry</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1372" class="">thirsty</st>, <st data-num="1130" class="">poorly clothed</st>, <st data-num="2852" class="">brutally treated</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="790" class="">without a roof over our heads</st>.

We do <st data-num="2872">hard work</st>, <st data-num="2038" class="">toiling</st> with our <st data-num="2398" class="">own</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st>. When we are <st data-num="3058">verbally abused</st>, we <st data-num="2127">respond with a blessing</st>, when <st data-num="1377" class="">persecuted</st>, we <st data-num="430" class="">endure</st>,
when people lie about us, we answer in a friendly manner. We are the world’s dirt and scum, even now.
I am not writing these things to shame you, but to correct you as my dear children.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">though</st> you may <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3463">10,000</st> <st data-num="3807" class="">guardians</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>, you do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> have <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">fathers</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1080" class="">became</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1080" class="">father</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st>.

I <st data-num="3870" class="">encourage</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="3767" class="">then</st>, <st data-num="1096" class="">be</st> <st data-num="3402" class="">imitators</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

<st data-num="1223" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3778">this reason</st>, I have <st data-num="3992" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="5095" class="">Timothy</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="27" class="">dear</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4103" class="">faithful</st> <st data-num="5043" class="">son</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>. <st data-num="3739">He</st> will <st data-num="363" class="">remind</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3598" class="">ways</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2531" class="">as</st> I <st data-num="1321" class="">teach</st> them <st data-num="3837" class="">everywhere</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st>.

<st data-num="5100" class="">Some</st> have <st data-num="5448">become arrogant</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> if <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> were <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> I will <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="5030" class="">soon</st>, <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> is <st data-num="2309" class="">willing</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I will <st data-num="1097">find out</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> only the <st data-num="3056" class="">talk</st> of these <st data-num="5448">arrogant people</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> also their <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> is demonstrated <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3056">idle talk</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st>.
What do you want? Shall I come to you with a rod of discipline or with love and a spirit of gentleness?
